answers.answer: Omg me too I'm actually being induced tomm. But I've had swollen feet and legs for a few weeks and it seems even if I put them up they stay swollen. My doctor prescribed me Tylenol with codeine for headaches. But what helps me the most is a bath!!! Very soothing maybe it can help u. Feel better
Not to worry u but you should probably call the doc and get checked isn't swelling and headaches a sign of pre eclampsia?
Get checked its a sign of preeclampsia
Got checked wasn't preclampsia. Just a bad headache

question: Im 38 weeks 5 days and I have swollen feet/legs. And a big headache!Any other mommies dealing with this?What you do for it?Feeling like crap
title: Swollen Feet!!!!!
